title: Color - DIcons
description: How to install dicons and download icons for your app.

body.raw:
This site is a work in progress. If you see dummy text on a page, it means I'm still working on it. You can follow updates on Twitter [@designali_in](https://twitter.com/designali_in). By default, all icons have the color value: currentColor. This keyword uses the element's computed text color value to represent the icon color. ## Example ```bash import { Smile } from "dicons"; function App() { return (
); } export default App; ```
